reviewText: A good dvd although not as instructional as I would've liked. I did learn a thing or 2 about safety but not much about technique. I'm also just a little jealous that Robert Dante got to play with those 3 hot chicks. Worth a look if you're new to whip play
Very nicely done video with some good pointers on how to get started in whip "play".

I ordered this video as Robert Dante is one of the well known whip crackers in America.  There is a wealth of information on whips and how to crack them, but some very strange stuff to go along.  First of all is Robert Dante's clothes.  My roommate said he is wearing suspended MC Hammer pants.  This is correct.  Also Mr Dante takes a very strange breath each time he snaps the whip.  Very strange.  There are some strange S&M sequences, which I found to odd to be entertaining.  The informational parts of the video are really great for any beginning whip cracker (age of consent).
Down to earth presentation of fun with a single tail whip in the world of SM.  The Master explains how to approach this activity safely and informed.
